Magic City Tech

Magic City Tech is a group for Birmingham area developers, designers, marketers, business people, hobbyists, students, and other professionals involved in technology.

Currently it is a group of chat channels on slack. We hope to grow it to a vibrant community and include much more. Think of it as a common space for all to use and enjoy. We talk about the technologies we use, our successes and failures, job opportunities, and the latest cute animal GIFs.

Join Us!

Fill out the form below and we will add you as fast as we can!

Magic City Tech runs on Slack, a simple and easy way for people to stay connected.

The current moderators are:

  • Henry McBride
  • Josh Adams

If you’d like to participate as an admin or to invite your group to the discussion, just ask one of them how to get involved.
